channel.title: Comments on: Keyboarding in Word
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: chopstik
item.dc:creator: chopstik
item.description: In my cases, I operate faster with the keyboard than I do with switching back and forth with a mouse. If I tried to do everything with the mouse (select the section I want to highlight and then move the mouse over to the Highlight button on the menu item), it's more effort and just harder to do. By using the keyboard shortcut, I can use the mouse or the directional buttons on my keyboard to select the section I want and then my keyboard shortcut to perform the actual highlighting. It may not work for those who are more mouse-centric but I found it easier for me.
item.content:encoded: In my cases, I operate faster with the keyboard than I do with switching back and forth with a mouse. If I tried to do everything with the mouse (select the section I want to highlight and then move the mouse over to the Highlight button on the menu item), it’s more effort and just harder to do. By using the keyboard shortcut, I can use the mouse or the directional buttons on my keyboard to select the section I want and then my keyboard shortcut to perform the actual highlighting. It may not work for those who are more mouse-centric but I found it easier for me.

item.title: By: genomon
item.dc:creator: genomon
item.description: "I was recently asked to go manually update a bunch of Word documents with specific formatting." Just curious how the shortcut helped accomplish this??
item.content:encoded: “I was recently asked to go manually update a bunch of Word documents with specific formatting.” Just curious how the shortcut helped accomplish this??
